name: split_condenser_fan_motor_efficiency_fault
display_name: Split Condenser Fan Motor Efficiency Fault

arguments.name: coil_choice
arguments.display_name: Enter the name of the faulted Coil:Cooling:DX:SingleSpeed object

arguments.name: sch_choice
arguments.display_name: Enter the name of the schedule of the fault levelIf you do not have a schedule, leave this blank

arguments.name: degrd_lvl
arguments.display_name: Fan motor efficiency degradation level of the Cooling:Coil:DX:SingleSpeed object

arguments.name: fan_power_ratio
arguments.display_name: Ratio of condenser fan motor power consumption to combined power consumption of condenser fan and compressor at rated condition

modeler_description: To use this Measure, choose the Coil:Cooling:DX:SingleSpeed object to be faulted and a schedule of fault level. Define the fault level as the degradation level of fan motor efficiency. If the fault level is outside the range of zero and one, an error will occur.
description: This Measure simulates the effect of fan motor efficiency fault at condenser of a split system or DX unit to the building performance.
